text:
June 6, 1962
Mr. Raymond D. Hurlbert
General Manager
Alabama Educational TV Commission
2151 Highland Avenue
Birmingham 5, Alabama
Dear Mr. Hurlbert:
Mr. Hill asked me to answer your letter of May 31. The list of active TV
members in Region II, which was included in your letter, is complete and
accurate except for one new member who joined us last month. The new
member is:
WHRO-TV, Hampton Roads ETV Association, 735 Pembroke
Avenue, Norfolk 7, Virginia, Mr. Blair L. Mackenzie,
General Manager.
I might also point out, at this time, that WXGA-TV (Kaycross, Georgia) is
not an active member of the NAEB.
The Florida Educational Television Commission (James Etheridge, Executive
Secretary) is an affiliate member, not an active member.
Mr. Hill talked with Mr. Hull last week and no date has been set for the
IERT meeting next spring. The NAEB Board meeting will, of course, be during
the IERT meeting. However, we can give you no definite information yet.
I hope this answers your questions. If I can be of further help, please
let me know.
Sincerely,
Anne B. Taylor
Staff Associate
